translations: 总督；太守；主管人；有最后决定权的人

sentences.sentence: Satrap of Prefecture Shu, i. e. Li Bing, and his son, drawing on the experience of people bridling in the currents, led the locals in the executing of a project for controlling the waters in 256.
sentences.translation: 公元前256年，秦国蜀郡太守李冰和他的儿子，吸取前人的治水经验，率领当地人民兴建水利工程。
